attributes.action: approve the 50mph limit on rural roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will improve safety  and the smaller rural A Roads need to have speed limit reduced. Many walkers, cyclists, horse riders and joggers would benefit. The current 60 limit is often abused with cars going 70-80mph, reducing the limit to 50 will force these drivers to go slower.
